author: Connor Creates
description:
middle of nowhere on the ocean is the most amazing float house/painting studio! Truly such a special place filled with unique character and charm. 

Thanks Mark Hobson for being a part of episode 8 of Creative Spaces and Faces! Definitely recommend checking out his work and if you’re in Tofino go stop by his gallery! 

#artiststudio #painter #tofino #paintingstudio #boat #boathouse
title: Incredible Floating Art Studio on the Ocean
